description:
This session is aimed at the mid-level front-end developers who want to improve their front-end skills and someone who is interested in the advertising front-end development. In this session, I will present following items:

• Interpolation
• Tween Engines
• Canvas effects
• Basic GLSL (Using THREE.JS and/or PIXI.JS)
• Optimization
• How to be a better front-end developer

About myself

My name is Edan Kwan and I am a developer from Hong Kong. I did interactive experiences for brands including Pepsi, Chanel, Omega, Swatch, Paco Rabbane, Ubisoft, Fox, Sony, SoBe, Mountain Dew, Adobe, Logitech, etc. If you are interested in what front-end projects I did, you can have a look at: http://www.edankwan.com/ or check out this SOTM of AWWWARD winning site at http://i-remember.fr/

https://vimeo.com/116943434
title: Advanced frontend development
